frameworks: Spring Boot 3.0.4 (Spring MVC, embedded servlet container)
deployment_relevant_files: Dockerfile (multi-stage Maven build -> OpenJDK 17 runtime, exposes 8080)
target/ (build output; referenced by Dockerfile: target/helloapp-1.0.0.jar)
architectural_resources: Web application/API service (Spring Boot) listening on port 8080 (Dockerfile)
Container image build/publish to Docker registry (Dockerfile, Jenkinsfile)
CI/CD resources: Jenkins pipeline agent, SonarQube server for code analysis, Trivy container image scanning (Jenkinsfile)
Relational database: H2 (embedded/in-memory) and PostgreSQL driver included, implying optional external PostgreSQL DB usage (pom.xml)
